/ * part 4 of LP problem * /
```{r}
library("lpSolveAPI")
x <- read.lp("LP4.lp")
x
```

```{r}
solve(x)
get.objective(x)
```
```{r}
get.variables(x)
```

```{r}
get.constraints(x)
```
